JobTitle: Manager/Sr. Manager, Middle Market Demand Generation
JobFullDesc:
The Lead Generation, Nurture and Enablement team is part of the Prospect Marketing organization in Global Commercial Services.  This team is focused on being essential to the US SME Sales & Marketing distribution engine by providing high octane fuel to create new customer relationships and expand existing customer relationships. Annually, this team contributes more than 50% of Prospect Marketing’s annual goal. 
One way to fuel the US SME distribution engine is through multi-channel (primarily digital) marketing to the Middle Market business segment. These marketing programs build awareness of American Express and our product suite, generate and nurture qualified demand, and partner with direct response channel leaders and Sales to convert these leads as effectively as possible.
This Manager/Senior Manager role focuses on building best in class B2B Digital Media strategies that integrate effectively and seamlessly into the broader US SME Account Based Marketing Demand Generation strategy 
Key Responsibilities:
This person will primarily be responsible for:

Understanding leading and innovative practices in B2B digital marketing and integrating them into US SME strategies to drive accelerated growth 
Developing Account- Based Marketing Paid Media strategies and campaigns to build awareness and drive demand for products including, but not limited to, the Corporate Card Program, Corporate Card Program for Start Ups
Advancing our capabilities to identify, qualify and prioritize leads for Sales using deterministic digital data (“digital signals”). Building a roadmap for expanding the adoption of digital signals data across Sales teams and prospect experiences
Partnering with Global Commercial Analytics to identify, evaluate and onboard data partners that advance our Account Based Marketing capabilities and reach 
Managing external agency & partner relationships 
Collaborating closely with teammates across the full LGNE team to active integrated prospect experiences
Partner closely with Sales (Phone & Field) to understand and to advance lead quality and digital lead intelligence to drive higher conversion rates, higher value sales and shorter sales cycles  
Accountability for developing program performance insights that fuel near term and longer -term optimization of strategies and investments 

 
 
Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations.

5 years+ of B2B and/ or Digital Marketing experience 
Passion for B2B Marketing and the powerful intersection of Marketing & Sales 
Data-driven strategic thinking – ability to ask the right questions and use data to develop winning, profitable strategies
Digital/ performance marketing expertise; ability to build campaigns that connect with audience segments and motivate actions  
Paid Media channel experience and excitement – experience working with Digital data/ audience strategies and passion for introducing innovative new ones; experience across platforms and publishers a plus
Strong collaboration and partnership skills – track record for building positive relationships and finding mutual benefit with multiple cross-functional partners
Comfort developing, and being held accountable for, financial performance targets  
Desire to innovate and try new things! 
Positive attitude and desire to have fun at work!
